name: City Climb Monster Truck Hard Parking Simulator 3D
name_original: City Climb Monster Truck Hard Parking Simulator 3D
description:
Do you love driving ultimate Monster Truck and 4x4 Pickup Truck? Welcome to new adventure 2017 and feel the real thrill of monster truck parking by performing monster truck stunts on city ramps. In this truck arena perform air break jumping and impossible stunts with jumping monsters. The biggest monster trucks don't need parking tickets just drive loop after loops on ramps of modern city. The parking lots are placed on rooftop of skyscraper buildings you need accurate precision to be the legend of monster arena.

Drive and park on impossible tracks to be a monster truck legend. Take control of biggest and most exciting monster trucks & cars. Get real parking experience by accomplishing various crazy driving missions in the rooftops of the city that are easy to learn but hard to master. The parking mania will teach you how to park monster car accurately in parking lots by climbing rooftops of modern city. Use the high speed of 4x4 furious monster cars with strong hold on breaks on the edges of roads. Drive car both backward and forward with shift of gear.

In this simulation game you can pick one of six big trucks. There are various challenging sim parking levels and to get the highest score you need the great parking accuracy and try to park the truck in shortest time. Use your driving skills through every level and Prove that you have what it takes to drive a monster truck in real 3D world! So have fun and improve your parking skills behind the wheels and happy driving! Download now the new parking game of 2017 it's free.

Monster Truck Freestyle Parker Features
- Different Parking levels with parking hurdles in the modern city
- Extreme Monster arena driving experience
- Realistic 3D city rooftop graphics for police monster truck parking
- 5 different modern trucks for driving
- Real engine sounds
- 4 different cam angle.( 360 Rotating, Top, Back, Front )
- Realistic steering wheel ( Each wheel is designed special for unique driving experience. Every 4x4 SUV vehicle has different parking skills.)
Perfect simulation physics and realistic stunts
